metadata.title: CVE-2020-24585 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in the DTLS handshake implementation in wolfSSL before 4.5.0. Clear DTLS application_data messages in epoch 0 do not produce an out-of-order error. Instead, these messages are returned to the application.

criterions.comment: wolfssl package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.5.0+dfsg-2').
